Public Attributes

bool needsUpdate
 If set to true, you should call update() regularly (every frame or so) on this sound manager. If false, update() should not be called.
bool has3D
 true if 3D functions are available. If false, all use of 3D sounds and calls to setPos / setListenerPos will result in undefined behavior.
bool canLoadFile
 true if we can load sounds directly from file (containing encoded data)
bool canLoadStream
 If true, we can lound sound files from a Stream (containing encoded data).
bool canLoadSource
 true if we can load sounds from a SampleSource (containing raw data)

Detailed Description

Factory interface for creating Sound objects.

The SoundFactory is the main entry point to a given sound output system. It is used to create Sound objects, which may be connected to a sound file or stream, and which may be individually played, paused, and so on.

The class also contains a set of public bools which describe the capabilities the particular system. These should be set by implementations (base classes) in their respective constructors.

virtual SoundPtr Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::loadRaw ( SampleSourcePtr  input  )  [pure virtual]

Load a sound from a sample source. Only valid if canLoadSource is true.

This function loads a sound from a given stream as defined by SampleSource.

Parameters:
input the input source
stream true if the file should be streamed. Implementations may use this for optimizing playback of large files, but they are not required to.
Returns:
a new Sound object

virtual void Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::update (  )  [inline, virtual]

Call this every frame if needsUpdate is true.

This should be called regularly (about every frame in a normal game setting.) Implementions may use this for filling streaming buffers and similar tasks. Implementations that do not need this should set needsUpdate to false.

Reimplemented in Mangle::Sound::InputFilter, Mangle::Sound::FactoryFilter, Mangle::Sound::OpenAL_Factory, and OEngine::Sound::SoundManager.

Member Data Documentation

bool Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::canLoadFile

true if we can load sounds directly from file (containing encoded data)

bool Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::canLoadSource

true if we can load sounds from a SampleSource (containing raw data)

bool Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::canLoadStream

If true, we can lound sound files from a Stream (containing encoded data).

bool Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::has3D

true if 3D functions are available. If false, all use of 3D sounds and calls to setPos / setListenerPos will result in undefined behavior.

bool Mangle::Sound::SoundFactory::needsUpdate

If set to true, you should call update() regularly (every frame or so) on this sound manager. If false, update() should not be called.
